Package com.filetree.controller

Class FileTreeController

java.lang.Object
com.filetree.controller.FileTreeController
@Controller public class FileTreeController extends Object
The FileTreeController class handles all the endpoints

  • Method Details

    • findFiles

      @GetMapping("/getunique") @ResponseBody public Set<String> findFiles(@RequestParam String rootFolder, @RequestParam String extension)
      Endpoint to retrieve a set of unique filenames matching the specified extension.
      Parameters:
      rootFolder - The root folder to search.
      extension - The file extension to match.
      Returns:
      Returns with the list of the distinct filenames.

    • getHistory

      @GetMapping("/history") @ResponseBody public List<LogEntryDTO> getHistory()
      Endpoint to get the /getunique endpoint's calling history
      Returns:
      Returns with a list of responses

    • getDocumentation

      @GetMapping("/doc") public String getDocumentation()
      Endpoint to get the Application Documentation
      Returns:
      Redirects to the root folder, where the documentation is

    • generateFileStructure

      @GetMapping("/gen") @ResponseBody public String generateFileStructure()
      Endpoint to generate a random filesystem, to test the /getuniqe endpoint.
      Returns:
      Returns with a message if it was successful or not.
